properties.name: Colosseum
properties.message: The Colosseum is an ancient amphitheater in the center of Rome, Italy.

properties.name: Taj Mahal
properties.message: The Taj Mahal is a white marble mausoleum located in Agra, India.

properties.name: Great Wall of China
properties.message: The Great Wall of China is a series of fortifications made of various materials.

properties.name: Stonehenge
properties.message: Stonehenge is a prehistoric monument consisting of a ring of standing stones.

properties.name: Pyramids of Giza
properties.message: The Pyramids of Giza are ancient pyramid structures located in Giza, Egypt.
